sourcing.instructions:
1. Germanium Dioxide (GeO2) - Available from chemical supply companies or online retailers specializing in laboratory-grade chemicals. 
 2. Silicon Dioxide (SiO2) - Commonly found in hardware stores (as sand) or chemical suppliers. 
 3. Strontium Carbonate (SrCO3) - Can be sourced from specialty chemical suppliers or online.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 15.00 g of GeO2, 45.00 g of SiO2, and 36.00 g of SrCO3 using an analytical balance. 
 2. Combine the measured materials in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 3. Mix thoroughly using a mortar and pestle or mechanical mixer until a uniform powder is achieved.
